body.p: In June 2020, the Board amended the transition requirements relating to the risk mitigation option to:

li.p: permit an entity to apply the risk mitigation option in paragraph B115 of IFRSâ€¯17 prospectively from the transition date instead of the date of initial application; and
permit an entity that can apply IFRS 17 retrospectively to a group of insurance contracts to instead apply the fair value approach if, and only if:
the entity chooses to apply the risk mitigation option to the group prospectively from the transition date; and

before the transition date, the entity had been using derivatives, reinsurance contracts held or non-derivative financial instruments measured at fair value through profit or loss to mitigate financial risk arising from the group of insurance contracts.
